transcript:
Customer: [inaudible]
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Sollunga.
Customer: Sir good morning sir Napriya India Mart la irunthu call pesura Agaran solution.
Customer: Sollunga madam.
Executive: Sir ungaloda account manager kannda manager pesura ippo. So neenga mail pannirukinga sir India Mart ku neengatha share pannirunthingala illa na vera any other person.
Customer: Madam share pannirupanga. Idhu stand number enakkitta koduthirupanga.
Executive: Okay so avanga kitta tha discuss pannura maari irukkum le.
Customer: Avanga kitta discuss pannunga.
Executive: Okay avangalukku call pannen sir avanga edukala. So avanga waiting la iruppanga athu thaan.
Executive: Okay sir naan number avangalukku share pannura WhatsApp pannura enakkku andha number la tha ungala reach panna sollunga sir.
Customer: Sari okay.
Executive: Okay. Enakku enna kuri podura naan.
Customer: Illa sir avanga India Mart kaana refund paid panni mail potrukanga.
Customer: Okay sir okay naan number kodunga naan avangalukku forward pannura.
Executive: Okay thank you.
Customer: Thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer wants to know reason for the call.

- Regarding refund paid for IndiaMART.



Resolution:

- Executive informed that account manager will call.

- Executive will share the number to the manager.



Next Steps: 

- None



Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- refund, account manager, call
